TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Point extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示二维空间中的 x 坐标和 y 坐标对。

span.span: Represents an x- and y-coordinate pair in two-dimensional space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 中, 和值之间的分隔符可以是逗号或空格。In XAML, the delimiter between the and values of a can be either a comma or a space. 某些区域性可能使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符, 而不是句点字符。Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character. 在大多数 XAML 处理器实现中, 用于固定区域性的 XAML 处理默认为 en-us, 并期望句点是小数分隔符。XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter. 如果在 XAML 中指定了, 则应避免使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符, 因为这将与属性值到和组件的字符串类型转换冲突。You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a attribute value into the and components. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` -or- ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *x**x* 此 的 x 坐标。The x-coordinate of this . *y**y* 此 的 y 坐标。The y-coordinate of this . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何检查两个结构是否不相等。The following example shows how to check if two structures are not equal. 它还说明了在声明结构时以及在声明结构后如何向结构分配值。It also illustrates how to assign values to a structure when the structure is being declared and after the structure has been declared. [!code-csharp[PointExamples_snip#PointInequalityExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PointExamples_snip/CSharp/PointExample.cs#pointinequalityexample)] [!code-vb[PointExamples_snip#PointInequalityExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PointExamples_snip/visualbasic/pointexample.vb#pointinequalityexample)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用值描述坐标。 coordinates are described using values. 由于在上运算时 , 的值可能会丢失精度, 因此, 逻辑上相等的两个值之间的比较可能会失败。Because the value of a can lose precision when operated upon, a comparison between two values that are logically equal might fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用非静态 方法检查两个结构是否相等。The following example shows how to check if two structures are equal using the non-static method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作等效于将添加 到。This operation is equivalent to adding a to a . 请注意, 仅当可以直接更改和属性时, 调用方法才会起作用。Note that calling the method will only have an effect if you can change the and properties directly. 由于是一个值类型, 因此, 如果使用属性或索引器引用对象, 则会获得对象的副本, 而不是对对象的引用。Because is a value type, if you reference a object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object. 如果尝试对属性或索引器引用进行更改, 则会出现编译器错误。If you attempt to change or on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs. 同样, 对属性或索引器调用将不会更改基础对象。Similarly, calling on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object. 如果要更改被引用为属性或索引器的的值, 请创建新的, 修改其字段 , 然后将返回回属性或索引器。If you want to change the value of a that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new , modify its fields, and then assign the back to the property or indexer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何偏移 结构的和值。The following example shows how to offset the and values of a structure. [!code-csharp[PointExamples_snip#OffsetExample_csharp](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PointExamples_snip/CSharp/PointExample.cs#offsetexample_csharp)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用值描述点的坐标。A point's coordinates are described using values. 因为在对它们执行算术运算时, 的值可能会丢失精度, 所以, 逻辑上相等的两个值之间的比较可能会失败。Because the value of can lose precision when arithmetic operations are performed on them, a comparison between two values that are logically equal might fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用重载 (= =) 运算符检查两个结构是否相等。The following example shows how to check if two structures are equal using the overloaded (==) operator.
